short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Create a button in your email to get more clicks with Gmail Button
short.de: Erstellen Sie eine Schaltfläche in Ihrer E-Mail, um mit der Gmail-Schaltfläche mehr Klicks zu erhalten
short.es: Cree un botón en su correo electrónico para obtener más clics con Gmail Button
short.fr: Créez un bouton dans votre e-mail pour obtenir plus de clics avec le bouton Gmail
short.it: Crea un pulsante nella tua e-mail per ottenere più clic con il pulsante Gmail
short.ja: メールにボタンを作成して、Gmailボタンでクリック数を増やしましょう
short.nl: Maak een knop in uw e-mail om meer klikken te krijgen met Gmail Button
short.pl: Utwórz przycisk w wiadomości e-mail, aby uzyskać więcej kliknięć za pomocą przycisku Gmail
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Crie um botão no seu e-mail para obter mais cliques com o botão do Gmail
short.zh_CN: 在您的电子邮件中创建一个按钮，以通过 Gmail 按钮获得更多点击

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you know that you have  67% more of a chance that someone will click on a button in your email, than if you sent them a simple link? 

With Gmail Button, you can create a button easily in about 30 seconds. You'll be able to make sure that your button has its own:
✅ URL link
✅ Background color
✅ Text color
✅ Border color
✅ Border size
 
This is great for sending people to your: 
✔️ Blog Post
✔️ Website 
✔️ Pricing page
✔️ YouTube movie 
✔️ Meeting Scheduler 
*Pro Tip: Try Gmail Meeting Scheduler for Gmail: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/meeting-scheduler-for-gma/dibjpgjiefaibdinijeddhaiiphfhejp
✔️ An Amazon product page link
✔️ Anywhere else you want people to go

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/
App website: https://www.gmail-button.com/
Pricing: https://www.gmail-button.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-button/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net

Gmail and  Google Workspace are trademarks of Google LLC. Use of these trademarks is subject to Google Permissions.
